list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the release of a prisoner temporarily (for a special purpose) or permanently before the completion of a sentence, on the promise of good behavior.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he committed a burglary while on parole
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã phạm một vụ trộm trong khi tạm tha

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the actual linguistic behavior or performance of individuals, in contrast to the linguistic system of a community.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was paroled after serving nine months of a two-year sentence
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta bị tạm tha sau khi phục vụ chín tháng bản án hai năm
